title: Integrate Help Panes in your ALM process
description: Explains how to integrate Dynamics 365 Help Pane configurations into solutions so they can travel through your ALM pipeline alongside feature development, covering both adding existing Help Pages and creating new ones directly from a solution.

title: Configure Help Panes in Dynamics 365
description: A deep dive into configuring Help Panes in Dynamics 365 model-driven apps, covering how to enable the feature, the full range of formatting and insertion options available in the editor, and how coach marks and balloons can be used to build interactive in-app guidance.

title: Help button options in Dynamics 365
description: An overview of the help button options available in Dynamics 365, covering the default Microsoft documentation link, global and entity-specific custom help pages with URL parameters, and the Help Panes preview feature for building interactive in-app guidance.
